main event: Two silver-colored wheel-shaped objects, bright in color, were observed flying straight from north to south in Gatlinburg, Tennessee on September 23, 1954, at 23:44 for a duration of 2 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as wheel-shaped and bright silver in color, flying one behind the other.
They were observed by a civilian and did not leave any physical evidence.
The attention was drawn to the objects by reflection, and they flew over the horizon.
The report classifies the conclusion as UNIDENTIFIED.
The observation was purely ground visual and no photographs were taken.
